name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination
display_help: Pain Domination gives a character the ability to manipulate, nullify and amplify pain. Ultimately this grants the user powerful healing, buffing and debuffing powers. It's healing output is unmatched!

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Nullify_Pain
powers.display_help: Nullify Pain will heal nearby allies for some hit points by numbing the pain caused by their wounds. Nullify Pain is not as potent as Soothe, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Soothe
powers.display_help: You heal an ally by numbing their pain and calming their mind. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Share_Pain
powers.display_help: Share Pain draws away some of an ally's anguish caused by their wounds, but damages the user. The pain caused by this power causes the user to go into a frenzy, briefly increasing their damage output, however the user cannot be healed and will have their regeneration rate greatly diminished for a short time. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ally Strong Heal, Self Moderate DMG(Special), +DMG

display_info: 25.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 15s on self
100.00% resistance to healing for 15s on self

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Conduit_of_Pain
powers.display_help: You revive a fallen ally by becoming a Conduit of Pain and transferring the pain that was inflicted upon them back upon your enemies. This will briefly empower you increasing your damage output, recovery rate, attack rate and chance to hit. After a minute the effect will wear off leaving you weakened for 30 seconds. Your damage, attack rate and chance to hit will all be reduced during this period. Recharge: Long

display_info: 75.00% strength to recharge for 1m 0s on self
30.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 0s on self
-30.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on self after 1m 0s delay
-20.00% to hit for 30s on self after 1m 0s delay

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Enforced_Morale
powers.display_help: Enforced Morale frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, Enforced Morale grants the target clearer Perception to see hidden foes, and a minor recharge and movement speed boost. The Protection and Movement boosts will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level, although the Recharge and Movement boosts will only apply for the first few applications. If the ally is not damaged, Enforced Morale will cause them some pain before granting its benefits. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception, +Recharge, +Speed, Minor DMG

display_info: -10.4 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 1m 30s on target
173.00% resistance to sleep for 1m 30s on target
103.80% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun for 1m 30s on target
276.80% resistance to sleep for 1m 30s on target
5.00% strength to recharge for 1m 30s on target
86.50% resistance to perception radius debuff for 1m 30s on target

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Soothing_Aura
powers.display_help: While this power is active all nearby allies will be healed by Soothing Aura every couple of seconds for a small portion of their health. (NOTE: While on PvP maps this power will grant affected targets a regeneration effect instead of a periodic heal.). Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Minor Periodic Heal

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.World_of_Pain
powers.display_help: When this power is activated the user and all nearby team members will gain a moderate damage, resistance, and To Hit bonus. Additionally those affected by this power will also be protected from Placate effects. Recharge: Long

display_info: 11.25% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 30s on target
16.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 30s on target

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Anguishing_Cry
powers.display_help: You let out an Anguishing Cry causing a great deal of pain in your foes reducing their resistance and defense to damage for a short time. Recharge: Long

display_info: -30.00% strength to defense for 30s on target
-22.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 30s on target

powers.name: Corruptor_Buff.Pain_Domination.Painbringer
powers.display_help: You transform an ally to pain incarnate turning them into an inexhaustible killing machine. While the character is imbued with this power they will benefit from incredible health regeneration, endurance recovery and improved damage potential for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 30s on target
